p: The fresh leaves of F. sur were collected from Dugda district, Oromia Region, situated 134 km from Addis Ababa, Ethiopia on April 27, 2019. Ato Melaku Wondafrash (MSc) did taxonomic identification and a voucher specimen MA/001 was given and deposited at the National Herbarium, College of Natural and Computational Sciences, Addis Ababa University for future reference.
